problem: 如图,已知线段AB=6cm,在线段AB的延长线上有一点C,且BC=4cm,若点M、N分别为AB、BC的中点,那么M、N两点之间的距离为()
comment: 本题主要考查线段的中点,掌握中点把线段分成两条相等的两条线段是解题的关键．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the line segment AB = N_0, there is a point C on the extended line of the line segment AB, and BC = N_1, if the points M and N are the midpoints of AB and BC, then the distance between the two points M and N is ()
